positive_contributors:
* Unique design with white style, the placement of each room throughout the villa is not monotonous. As there are rooms located at the top and bottom connected by stairs which also have a good design.
* The design is not commonly seen in many properties, so this can be a plus point.
* Double bunk beds are provided so that the size of the villa can accommodate many visitors.
* The beautiful jungle scenery gives it a calming natural feel.
* There is a well-designed pool with a white style that creates a cozy and clean impression.
* Complete and spacious facilities such as a large kitchen and karaoke room that can be used as a communal space.
negative_contributors:
* With a design that is dominated by white, it takes quite a lot of cost in maintenance so that the cozy and clean impression does not fade.
* The unbalanced experience that each visitor gets is because each room has different features, such as a bathtub.
* For the room type with a bunk bed, it looks quite small for a room with double bunk bed and also quite risky when used for children under the age of 5 when they play on the upper bed.

nterior Features

Distinctive Advantages

Fasilitas Dalam Ruangan

* This expansive modern luxury property offers captivating cityscape views from every room, meticulously designed with a Santorini-inspired theme.
* The distinctive pool design is complemented by a poolside lounge area, ideal for sunbathing and relaxation.
* Each room features a private ensuite bathroom, and 2 out of 5 provide access to picturesque views and a semi-outdoor experience, with 1 of the 2 properties boasting a bathtub.
* Every bedroom is thoughtfully equipped with a dedicated workspace and tastefully adorned with exquisite touches, including plush carpets, antique furnishings, and an array of captivating artwork gracing the walls.
* The property boasts ample parking space for guest convenience.
* Numerous gathering spaces are thoughtfully integrated, including a welcoming front room adjacent to the main area, suitable for both work and relaxation, along with an upstairs room designed to serve as a patio or recreational retreat.

* Setiap kamar dilengkapi dengan AC, wardrobe, serta kamar mandi pribadi yang beberapa memiliki bathtub dan beberapa semi terbuka. 
* Kamar memiliki desain yang semi terbuka membuat kamar nyaman untuk ditempati dengan akses pemandangan tropikal di sekitar untuk kamar yang terletak di lantai atas.
* Dekorasi pada setiap ruang tidak berlebihan, tidak ada ruang yang tidak dimanfaatkan dengan baik, semua sudut memberikan kesan nyaman.
* Kolam renang berukuran luas untuk 3 - 6 orang dilengkapi dengan pool lounge yang dapat digunakan untuk bersantai serta berjemur.
* Memiliki atap yang dapat digunakan untuk bersantai dan menikmati pemandangan langit.

Scenic Views

* Enjoy your stay with breathtaking ocean views that will leave you in awe.
* Immerse yourself in the natural beauty of the peninsula with panoramic views that stretch as far as the eye can see.
* Unwind by the pool while gazing at the lush jungle and the vast expanse of the ocean.
* Find tranquility in our beautiful garden, a perfect spot to relax with stunning views surrounding you.

Amenities

* A variety of dining venues, cozy cafes, productive coworking spaces, versatile event areas, and a well-equipped fitness club with scenic views are available around the villa.
* Abundant natural light in every room.
* Comfortable front room with sofas and washbasin.

* Desain bohemian unik dengan tema warna putih yang sesuai dengan preferensi market saat ini.
* Ornamen dan dekorasi yang bervariasi membuat unit terasa lebih hidup
* Taman yang luas dengan tanaman hijau di sekitar unit memperkuat tema tropis yang diusung.
* Kursi-kursi berjemur (sun loungers) di sekitar kolam untuk bersantai di luar ruangan.
* Smart TV di setiap ruangan untuk bersantai di kamar.

* The property is spacious, with 18 ares. Joglo-designed with premium furniture feels.
* A relaxing view of the river and jungle.
* Each room comes with a private bathroom with design that provides a different experience, light from outside can enter the bathroom through a leafy roof.
* Also each room comes with a private kitchen.
* Spacious swimming pool with an infinity design.
* Large backyard, perfect for a bonfire.

* White-themed modern Mediterranean design
* Spacious rooms with high ceiling gives abundant natural light and great ventilation
* 39-meter squared pool equipped with sun loungers
* Integrated modern kitchen and a breakfast bar

Cozy and Natural Property

* This property exudes a cozy and natural ambiance due to its extensive use of wood and abundant greenery as decorations.
* The clear and spacious swimming pool with a bridge and garden view adds to the overall appeal.

Ornate and Classic Interior

* The interior design of this property features ornate and classic elements, including chandeliers, exquisite wooden furniture, and intricate wall paneling. 
* Light, neutral colors create an inviting atmosphere.

Warm Lighting and Comfortable Seating

* Warm lighting from hanging chandeliers and decorative wall sconces enhances the atmosphere. 
* Wooden chairs with soft upholstery in the dining area provide a comfortable and cozy seating experience. 
* There are plenty of sofas for relaxation, and the seating arrangement around the table encourages group conversations.

Work Desk and Bedroom Comfort

* The bedroom includes a work desk, and not just one pillow but additional pillows are provided, which can be used as bolsters. 
* Bedside tables with hanging lamps and sofas for relaxation complement the bedroom's design. 

Poolside Relaxation and Wooden Pavilion

* Around the pool, there are comfortable sofas for relaxation under the wooden pavilion. 
* The living area boasts sunken seating arrangements that offer a perfect view of the pool through expansive windows, while the dining area emanates an authentic rustic charm with its teak and cowhide furnishings, creating a uniquely inviting atmosphere.

Well-Equipped Contemporary Kitchen

* The contemporary kitchen is fully equipped with top-tier appliances, including a refrigerator and coffee machine, ensuring functionality and convenience.

* Property designed with A-frame design, this design is quite popular and gives a contemporary and cozy impression.
* Each room is equipped with air conditioning and a private bathroom.
* The view of the rice paddy fields is breathtaking, giving off a soothing natural vibe.
* Modern design for the interior and amenities. Plus, the high-designed ceiling and large windows on the walls can provide natural light.
* Garden and swimming pool are available for guests to enjoy. Coupled with a gazebo that is very suitable for relaxing outside.
